infoArray.name: header
infoArray.desc: Text of criteria panel header button's text.

infoArray.name: children
infoArray.desc: Can be used to render elements inside the CriteriaPanel.

infoArray.name: expandable
infoArray.desc: If true, this criteria panel is expandable.

infoArray.name: onExpandChange
infoArray.desc: Callback function fired when the `expanded` state of the criteria panel has changed. @param {boolean} newExpandedState Represents the new `expanded` state of the criteria panel.

infoArray.name: onResize
infoArray.desc: Calls when resizable component resize. Calls back with (direction: string, styleSize: object, clientSize: object, delta: object).
